            separator = ""

            strAsync =""

                strAsync  = " async "

        public {{strAsync}} {{mi.ReturnType}} {{mi.NewName}} ({{mi.parametersDefinitionCSharp }} ){

            {{

                Method_End("{{mi.Name}}");
